Elegant Design
Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner presents a luxurious and feminine aesthetic, ideal for promoting elegant jewelry. It features a soft diagonal background gradient that blends light rose, blush pinks, and subtle coral tones, enhancing the delicate feel. The central visual highlight is a pair of intricately designed rose gold earrings, layered prominently in the right section. The text elements are well balanced: a bold serif title (`heading`) exudes sophistication, complemented by an airy cursive subtitle (`subheading`) and a neatly aligned product description (`description`). Pricing (`price`) is highlighted in bold, while a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) encourages immediate shopping. 

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Brown: `#8B4513`
- Soft Coral Rose: `#C35A54`
- Blush Gradient: `#FFF0F5`, `#FFE4E1`, `#FADADD`
- Button Text White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features elegant floral earrings with a delicate blend of soft rose gold and sparkling white crystals. The main color, a warm **rose pink (#F6A5A5)**, forms the base structure and petal motif, adding a romantic and feminine touch. The crystal stones exhibit a brilliant white shine with icy translucency, highlighted by **diamond white (#FFFFFF)** and subtle hints of **light silver (#DDE2E6)**. The smooth blending of metallic rose and the faceted brilliance of the crystals creates a balanced contrast, drawing the eye naturally across the piece. Ideal banner palette: Rose Pink (#F6A5A5), Diamond White (#FFFFFF), Light Silver (#DDE2E6), Coral Gold (#F3B3A6), and Soft Blush (#FFD9DF).
